text: The year 702 BC was a year of the pre-Julian Roman calendar. In the Roman Empire, it was known as year 52 Ab urbe condita . The denomination 702 BC for this year has been used since the early medieval period, when the Anno Domini calendar era became the prevalent method in Europe for naming years. ==Events== ==Births== ==Deaths== * Merodach Baladan, Babylonian ruler * Shabaka, Kushite pharaoh of the Twenty-fifth Dynasty of Egypt ==References== Category:700s BC
title: 702 BC
